prosecutorDefendantId.description: A unique reference to a defendant within a prosecution. Provided by the prosecuting authority e.g. DWP

cpsDefendantId.description: A unique reference to a defendant within a prosecution. Provided by cps when CPS are prosecuting the case

asn.description: A unique reference to a defendant within a prosecution. Provided by the police force and requested from the police by a non police prosecutor e.g. DWP requests from the police

prosecutorPersonDefendantDetails.description: The defendant person details for material relating to a defendant required to be matched with a defendant id provided by the prosecuting authority

cpsPersonDefendantDetails.description: The defendant person details for material relating to a defendant required to be matched with a defendant id provided by cps

prosecutorOrganisationDefendantDetails.description: The defendant organisation details for material relating to a defendant required to be matched with a defendant id provided by the prosecuting authority

cpsOrganisationDefendantDetails.description: The defendant organisation details for material relating to a defendant required to be matched with a defendant id provided by cps
